articles.title: Community’s amazing generosity will bring musician Kieran home - Donegal Daily
articles.description: A Go Fund Me page set up just a couple of days ago to help bring home the body of a well-known Donegal musician from America has been swamped with love and generosity. Ballyshannon Kieran Whelan sadly departed this world on Saturday 8th January in Baltimore, …

articles.title: Common Cold Can Protect Against Coronavirus, Study Finds - Voice of America
articles.description: U.S adults usually catch one or two common colds a year. They’re usually little more than an annoyance, but new research suggests they may offer some protection from a virus that’s much more dangerous. Henry Ridgwell reports from London.
